Title: Relates to certain crimes of interference with health care services or religious worship
Summary: Relates to certain crimes of interference with health care services or access to places of religious worship; expands interference to include groups of two or more people demonstrating or preparing to demonstrate twenty-five feet outside of reproductive health care facilities and places of religious worship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to certain crimes of interference with health care services or religious worship
